allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
security: remove exposed credentials and add environment template

- Remove config.env from repository tracking
- Add .env.example with placeholder values for all required environment variables
- Update .gitignore with comprehensive patterns for security files, logs, and build artifacts
- Prevent future credential exposure with enhanced gitignore rules

BREAKING CHANGE: config.env is no longer tracked. Copy .env.example to config.env and fill in your credentials.

Security Notice: All credentials previously in config.env must be rotated immediately:
- MongoDB Atlas password
- Cloudinary API keys  
- Gmail app password
- Stripe API keys
- JWT secret key
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: initialize Node.js project with metadata

- Add comprehensive project description
- Set package name to asd-healthcare-api
- Add keywords for discoverability \(asd, autism, healthcare, api\)
- Change license from ISC to MIT for open-source compatibility
- Add Node.js engine requirements \(>=18.0.0\)
- Add start script for production deployment
- Organize scripts in logical order \(start, dev, test\)

This establishes the project foundation with proper metadata for npm registry
and open-source distribution.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: add EditorConfig for consistent coding style

- Configure UTF-8 charset for all files
- Set LF line endings for cross-platform compatibility
- Enforce 2-space indentation for JavaScript and JSON
- Add final newline and trim trailing whitespace
- Configure Markdown exception for trailing whitespace
- Set tab indentation for Makefiles

EditorConfig ensures consistent code formatting across different
editors and IDEs, improving team collaboration and code quality.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add initial README with project overview

- Add project description and motivation
- List key features \(user management, healthcare services, AI integration\)
- Document tech stack with versions
- Add Getting Started section with prerequisites
- Include installation instructions
- Add MIT license and work-in-progress status

This provides essential documentation for developers getting started
with the project and establishes the foundation for comprehensive docs.
EOF
\)")
